participant_1.name: Maya Thompson
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Maya tends to keep her emotions and true feelings hidden from others, especially her family.
participant_1.background: I do not have my own home yet. I love Agatha Christie novels. I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents. I still like unicorns even though I'm an adult. I'm not sure if I'll be able to balance my work and my personal life.

participant_2.name: Lucas Meyer
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Lucas enjoys celebrating life’s milestones and cherishes his close relationship with family.
participant_2.background: I threw a huge party to celebrate my new freedom. I haven't worked at my current job for very long because I just moved to Vienna. I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself. I am close to my mother and love to spend time with her. I'm bored with my current lifestyle.

content.text: Hey there!
Hi! How are you doing?
Pretty good! Just got home from work. What about you?
I'm doing well! I just finished throwing a huge party to celebrate my new freedom.
New freedom? What do you mean?
I just moved to Vienna! I'm so excited to start this new chapter in my life.
That's awesome! I'm happy for you. I've always wanted to live in Vienna.
It's really great! The people are so friendly and the city is beautiful.
I'm sure it is. I've heard a lot of good things about it.
So what do you do for work?
I'm a pottery artist. I love making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents.
That's so cool! I've never met a pottery artist before.
It's a lot of fun! I love working with clay and creating new things.
I'm sure it is. I've always thought pottery was really neat.
It is! You should try it sometime.
I might just do that.
I hope you do! I'm sure you'd like it.
Thanks! I'm excited to explore Vienna now.
I'm sure you'll have a great time.
I know I will
